WorkItem.Summary: Reference to lib.d.ts leads to "Bad descriptor" running tsc.js on windows 7 pro 64bit

Comments.Message: That's right, but. Shouldn't script provide some more meaningful message rather than this?

You shouldn't have to reference lib.d.ts.. when I don't the attached file compiles without error, using eiter node, tsc.exe or cscript.
